input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product specifications and product name information.

Product name:
MotoFab Lifts CH-2.5-2.5" Front Leveling Lift Kit That Will Raise The Front Of Your Chevy/Gmc Pickup 2.5"

Product specifications:
Will Raise the front of your truck by a true 2.5"
Motofab Lifts are CNC machined out of billet aluminum then powdercoated black to match your factory suspension.
Can be installed in about 1 1/2-2 hours and does not require strut/coil disassembly like other kits.
Instructions and all necessary hardware included
Lift spacer thickness and lift is not a 1 to 1 ratio due to the suspension geometry.
Made In The USA 
Fits 2007-2018 Silverado / Sierra 2WD & 4WD (new body style)

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Looking for a lift kit that's quick and easy to install? This MotoFab Front Leveling Lift Kit can be installed in about 1 1/2-2 hours and does not require strut/coil disassembly like other kits. This kit will raise the front of your Chevy or GMC truck by a true 2.5". Motofab Lifts are CNC machined out of billet aluminum and then powder coated black to match your factory suspension. These high-quality spacers are the strongest on the market and will not crack over time like other welded spacers. Made is the USA, the kit comes complete with instructions and all the necessary hardware. This lift kit fits the 2007-2018 Silverado and Sierra 2WD & 4WD. Please note: Lift spacer thickness and lift is not a 1 to 1 ratio due to the suspension geometry.
input_text.Response B: Motofab lifts are made here in the USA and are the industry leader for front leveling kits. Their CH-2.5 kit will raise the front of your truck a true 2.5" for a more leveled aggressive look. These spacers are CNC machined out of billet aluminum and powdercoated for a long lasting durable finish that will match your factory suspension. These spacers can be installed in about 1 1/2 - 2 hours and do not require strut/coil disassembly like other kits.
